history.proof: intros m k z H1 H2. qauto use: cA_1_top, exd_bottom, not_pred_bottom, top_bottom_bis inv: dim.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
intros m k z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: The reference H was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
exceptions.tactic: apply bottom_bottom_1 with (k:=k) in H1 as H5.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable z.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
exceptions.exn: The reference H5 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
exceptions.exn: The reference sym_eq_dim_dec was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m zero z)) as [H5|H5].
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "z" in the current goal.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m zero z)) as [H5|H5].
exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m zero z)) as [H5|H5].
exceptions.tactic: apply bottom_bottom_1 with (k:=zero) in H1 as H6.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable z.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m zero z)) as [H5|H5].
exceptions.exn: The reference H6 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m zero z)) as [H5|H5].
exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

ctx: intros m k z H1 H2.
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4].
destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m zero z)) as [H5|H5].

original: intros m k z H1 H2. unfold bottom, cA_1. destruct H2. - rewrite H. simpl. destruct (eq_dim_dec k k) as [H3|H3]. + destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [H4|H4]. * rewrite H4. simpl. auto. * apply bottom_bottom_1 with (k:=k) in H1 as H5. rewrite H5. auto. + apply sym_eq_dim_dec in H3. contradiction. - apply exd_bottom in H2 as H3. rewrite H3. destruct (eq_dim_dec zero k) as [H4|H4]. + destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m zero z)) as [H5|H5]. * rewrite H5. reflexivity. * apply bottom_bottom_1 with (k:=zero) in H1 as H6. rewrite H6. reflexivity. + apply sym_eq_dim_dec in H4. contradiction.
